dataIdInfo.idAbs: Add Places ID to the eGIS features. This is no longer a required step. If you want to add the Places ID to your feature classes you should temporarily turn off editor tracking, otherwise all the features will appear to have been changed and therefore require an update of the data in Places.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Regan Sarwas, Alaska Region GIS Team, National Park Service

Consts.useLimit: THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. tool.name: IntegratePlacesIds

param.name: feature
param.dialogReference: <p/>The feature class that has been uploaded to Places
param.pythonReference: <p/>The feature class that has been uploaded to Places

param.name: table
param.dialogReference: <p/>The table documenting the upload. This table has the Places id for each feature uploaded.
param.pythonReference: <p/>The table documenting the upload. This table has the Places id for each feature uploaded.

param.name: gisid
param.dialogReference: <p/>The name of the field in the feature class that was used as the feature's unique id.
param.pythonReference: <p/>The name of the field in the feature class that was used as the feature's unique id.

param.name: placesid
param.dialogReference: <p/>The field in the feature class that will store the id created in Places.
param.pythonReference: <p/>The field in the feature class that will store the id created in Places.

param.name: gisidcsv
param.displayname: EGIS ID Field in Upload Log
param.dialogReference: <p/>The name of the field in the Upload Log Table that has the feature's unique id.
param.pythonReference: <p/>The name of the field in the Upload Log Table that has the feature's unique id.

param.name: placesidcsv
param.displayname: Places ID Field in Upload Log
param.dialogReference: <p/>The name of the field in the Upload Log Table that has the id created in Places.
param.pythonReference: <p/>The name of the field in the Upload Log Table that has the id created in Places.

tool.summary: Add Places ID to the eGIS features
tool.usage: Add Places ID to the eGIS features
